oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Solvent free chemical oxidative polymerization as a universal method for the synthesis of ultra high molecular weight conjugated polymers based on 3,4-propylenedioxythiophenes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KUMAR, A
SINGH, R
GOPINATHAN, SP
KUMAR, A
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: SOLID-STATE POLYMERIZATION
CATHODE ACTIVE MATERIAL
HIGH SPECIFIC CAPACITY
ELECTROCHROMIC DEVICES
POLY(3,4-ETHYLENEDIOXYTHIOPHENE)
POLYTHIOPHENE
CONVERSION
PRECURSORS
BATTERIES
CRYSTAL
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this communication, we report on a solvent free chemical oxidative polymerization route for the monomers based on 3,4-propylenedioxythiophenes wherein the process is applicable to both solid as well as liquid monomers and results in the bulk synthesis of ultra high molecular weight polymers.
